name: Bifrost
short_description: The first copy trading infrastructure that links cTrader/MT4/MT5, totally free but not open source (for now). Become a Sponsor if you want this project to become open source, support us.

params.title: Bifrost Provider x.x.x.
params.content: The name, version, and link to find references for this tool

params.title: Address
params.content: IP or url of service listner

params.title: Broker Sign
params.content: Some brokers use an additional character to the name of the pair, for example EURUSD.cash, so we will insert .cash in this value

params.title: Token
params.content: You need the token generated by Telegram's BotFather

params.title: Chat
params.content: The chat ID, can be a number or a name followed by @, e.g. @MyGroupExample

params.title: UserName
params.content: You can assign a name to this copytrading session, which is useful when you have many active services

params.title: Alert if trade opened?
params.content: You can disable the alert for this event

params.title: Alert if trade close?
params.content: You can disable the alert for this event

params.title: Alert if trade modified?
params.content: You can disable the alert for this event

params.title: Bifrost Copyer x.x.x.
params.content: The name, version, and link to find references for this tool

params.title: Address
params.content: IP or url of service to connect

params.title: Strategys (* = all strategys; ^ = without; 123456,^,9383746,...)
params.content: You can choose which Label or Magic Number to copy, including those without with placeholder ^

params.title: Translate (EURUSD:AUDUSD,AUDUSD:NZDUSD,...)
params.content: You can change the trade destination, used for related pairs, for example I would like to be able to open a trade for GBPUSD with the EURUSD trigger

params.title: Size Mode
params.content: You can choose which type of size calculation to apply, in the next parameters you can change the attributes

params.title: Fixed Size (bypass filter)
params.content: Independent of Provider size it will always open this size, if selected in Size Mode bypass all other filters

params.title: Percentage
params.content: If selected in Size Mode it calculates a percentage of the Provider

params.title: Minimum Size (zero disable)
params.content: Independent of the size calculation obligates a minimum size

params.title: Maximum Size (zero disable)
params.content: Independent of the size calculation obligates a maximum size

params.title: Broker Sign
params.content: Some brokers use an additional character to the name of the pair, for example EURUSD.cash, so we will insert .cash in this value

params.title: Token
params.content: You need the token generated by Telegram's BotFather

params.title: Chat
params.content: The chat ID, can be a number or a name followed by @, e.g. @MyGroupExample

params.title: UserName
params.content: You can assign a name to this copytrading session, which is useful when you have many active services

params.title: Alert if trade opened?
params.content: You can disable the alert for this event

params.title: Alert if trade close?
params.content: You can disable the alert for this event

params.title: Alert if trade modified?
params.content: You can disable the alert for this event
